MACROS-AND-MORE.DialogMaintenanceHint:
Remove all macros and import the latest compendium versions.

Any customisations will be lost. Move these out of the directory first if you want to preserve any changes you have made.
MACROS-AND-MORE.SettingsMaintenanceMenuH: Replace imported macros with latest compendium versions.
MACROS-AND-MORE.MessageNoPermission: You have no permissions for this action
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Label: Sea Weather Generator
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.SeaSickness: Every Human, Dwarf, Halfling, or Ogre Character should make a Challenging(+0) Endurance Test or suffer from sea sickness.
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Precipitation.Ligh: –10 to Athletics, Climb, and Ranged (Blackpowder) Tests
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Precipitation.Heav: –20 to Athletics, Climb, and Ranged (Blackpowder) Tests, –10 to Leadership, Navigation, Perception, Row, and Sail Tests
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Precipitation.Very: –30 to Athletics, Climb, and Ranged (Blackpowder) Tests, -20 to Leadership, Navigation, Perception, Row, and Sail Tests, –10 to all other Tests
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Temperature.Label: Temperature
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Temperature.Swelte: Every two hours, make a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test. If the Test is failed, suffer the effects of Heat Exposure. Crew members must drink two gallons of water a day or else suffer from Thirst
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Temperature.HotDes: Every four hours, make an Average (+20) Endurance Test. If the Test is failed, suffer the effects of Heat Exposure. Crew members must drink two gallons of water a day or else suffer from Thirst.
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Temperature.Comfor: Moderately cool or warm, the temperature is tolerable and has no effect on the crew.
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Temperature.Chilly: Every four hours, make an Average (+20) Endurance Test. If the Test is failed, suffer the effects of Cold Exposure.
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Temperature.Bitter: Every two hours, make a Challenging (+0) Endurance Test. If the Test is failed, suffer effects of Cold Exposure.
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Visibility.Label: Visibility
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Visibility.MistyDe: Ranged Tests, Navigation Tests, and Perception Tests based on sight suffer from a –1 SL penalty if the target is more than 20 yards away.
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Visibility.FoggyDe: Ranged Tests, Navigation Tests, and Perception Tests based on sight suffer from a –2 SL penalty if the target is more than 10 yards away.
SEA-WEATHER-GENERATOR.Visibility.ThickFo: Ranged Tests, Navigation Tests, and Perception Tests based on sight suffer from a –3 SL penalty if the target is more than 5 yards away.

mode.most-frequent: had the most frequent mode with

gm_see_players.Name: See Player Roll Icons?
gm_see_players.Hint: If enabled, the GM will see icons beside all player names that they can use to access that player's roll stats.

roll_storage.Name: Max rolls stored
roll_storage.Hint: How many rolls should the system store before older rolls begin to be overwritten?

players_see_players.Name: Can Players Access Tracked Rolls?
players_see_players.Hint: If disabled, players will not be able to access their roll summaries.

count_hidden.Name: Count Blind Rolls?
count_hidden.Hint: If disabled, blind rolls for players will not be counted in the tracker.

streak_behaviour.Name: Streak Behaviour
streak_behaviour.Hint: Choose whether to disable streak messages, send them only to the GM, or show them publicly. Note: streaks that include a blind roll are always whispered to the GM.

streak_threshold.Name: Streak Threshold
streak_threshold.Hint: The number of consecutive rolls within 1 point of each other that should be counted as a streak.

restrict_counted_rolls.Name: Don't Count Unlinked Rolls
restrict_counted_rolls.Hint: If enabled, the tracker will not count any rolls that are not explicitly linked to an actor. Ex: typing /r 1d20 in the chat will not be counted, but an attack or saving throw will be.

restrict_counted_rolls.Name: Don't Count Unlinked Rolls
restrict_counted_rolls.Hint: If enabled, the tracker will not count any rolls that are not explicitly linked to an actor. Ex: typing /r 1d20 in the chat will not be counted, but an attack or saving throw will be.

clear_rolls.title: Clear Rolls?
clear_rolls.content: Are you sure you want to clear your rolls? This cannot be undone.
